name: Time's Novel
description:
Time's Novel

Jacob is a regular guy that likes to take long walks in the forest. One day, he travels a bit further than usual and finds a book on the ground.

That book knows all that happened, whether it's about the past, the present or the future.

Liked the game?

Then please consider supporting it - it's free to do so! Learn how to support me as a creator here!

Also, please DM me on Twitter @InteractiveSto3 if you find any bugs! I would really appreciate that!

Art:

  • Apartment Background
  • Forest Background
  • Character Sprite

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily distrubed.
